resources.string: Click on one of our names to find out more:

"Hi, I'm Robert and I am an older student returning to TRU to finish my Computer Science degree. 

I love exploring BC with my family and really enjoy building stuff in my garage. 

More and more often I find myself building things on my computer as I continue progress with my programming abilities. "
Hi! Im Chloe, I am in a Bachelors of Computing Science and I spend my summers planting trees and being the First Aid Attendant in our camp!
Hello, I\'m Ben Nichols, a passionate programmer attending university. I enjoy swimming competively with the WolfPack, and enjoy programming / gaming in my spare time.
This is a picture of my Corgi, Rosieanne!
